allow: Bash(bash -c 'QUESTION=$(curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/question) && echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq . && QUESTION_ID=$(echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq -r "".id"") && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/answer/$QUESTION_ID -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""answer\"":\""Paris\"",\""walletAddress\"":\""0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890\""}"" | jq .')

Bash(bash -c 'QUESTION=$(curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/question) && echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq . && QUESTION_ID=$(echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq -r "".id"") && ANSWER=$(echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq -r "".options[1]"") && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/answer/$QUESTION_ID -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""answer\"":\""$ANSWER\"",\""walletAddress\"":\""0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890\""}"" | jq .')

Bash(bash -c 'QUESTION=$(curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/question) && echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq . && QUESTION_ID=$(echo ""$QUESTION"" | jq -r "".id"") && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/answer/$QUESTION_ID -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""answer\"":\""Da Vinci\"",\""walletAddress\"":\""0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890\""}"" | jq .')
